transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ha, hi good morning Hardik sir Avnish baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se kaise ho aap?
Executive: Ji ji good morning.
Customer: Ha kal wo aap mere ko call kiye the na wo wala issue ke liye wo jo aapka issue aa raha tha whatsapp wala.
Executive: Bhai.
Customer: To abhi bhi same cheez ki problem chal rahi hai sir?
Executive: Ha sir wo chahe matlab char din se chal rahi hai char din me kaisa hota hai.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Saturday ko bhi humne kara to wo band ho gaya fir wo ja kar ke chalu hua sunday ko 24 ghante baad correct.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai fir humne wapas se.
Customer: To wo actual me sir wo whatsapp ko log out kar raha hai ya kis cheez ko log out kar raha hai?
Executive: Whatsapp ko block kar raha hai ek din ke liye.
Customer: Whatsapp ko hi block kar de raha hai.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Okay aap ek phone me multiple whatsapp chala rahe ho Hardik sir?
Executive: Nahi.
Customer: Single whatsapp hai aur ye aapka jo whatsapp connected hai sir ye whatsapp business hai ya fir normal whatsapp hai.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Business pe hai na.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Whatsapp business ki wajah se ho sakta hai block ho jata ho waise wo IndiaMART ke through to nahi ho raha hoga.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi nahi aisi baat nahi hai aisa kuch nahi hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Whatsapp business ki wajah se block nahi hota agar abhi mai aapko bol du sir mera whatsapp normal hai abhi mera business pe hai bhi nahi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hai hi nahi mera business aap boliye sir.
Customer: Abhi kaisa chal raha hai sir abhi current time pe matlab abhi humne check kiya.
Executive: Kal ke kal se.
Customer: Nahi abhi block pada hai wo khulega 12 baje tak.
Customer: 12 baje tak open hoga.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ha whatsapp normal hai mera sir business nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai aap ek kaam kar sakte ho sir ek baar aap uska ek chota sa video bana kar ke de sakte ho matlab jaise lead manager pe aap jaate ho right lead manager pe ja kar ke aap waha pe whatsapp pe share on whatsapp ka option aata hai right sir.
Customer: Sir nahi kar sakta nahi kar sakta mai nahi kar sakta ye cheez mai wapas se ek din ke liye block karaunga.
Executive: Sir mere ko wo chahiye tha matlab.
Customer: Sir nahi kar sakta abhi possible hi nahi hai mai mera whatsapp kyu ek din ke liye block karaunga aapki video ke liye.
Executive: Nahi to aapki to aapka waise bhi already block hai ya fir normal abhi continue pe hai.
Customer: Sir agar mai abhi 12 baje chalu hota hai mai wapas se wo karunga to wapas block ho jayega ek din ke liye.
Executive: Okay aur fir uske baad jaise aaj 12 baje agar khul jata hai sir right to wo fir kitne din tak continue chalta rehta hai waise wo matlab per day ka aisa hi chalta hai kya sir?
Customer: Hamare char din se humko yahi problem ho rahi hai.
Executive: Matlab daily aapka open hota hai daily aapka band hota hai.
Customer: Daily open hota hai chalta hai matlab abhi beech me hamare char panch ghante chala tha kyuki jis din humne sirf phone me dusra kaam kara tha photo click karna ye wo normal whatsapp pe reply karna whatsapp par catalog bechna ye wo sab kara sab us time tak sab chala tha contact bhi hua whatsapp par calling bhi kari customer se whatsapp par customers ko reply bhi kara aur jitne bhi customers ki inquiry aati hai sabko jawab diya sab kuch kara jaise IndiaMART par gaye inquiry dekhne aur fir uske upar click kara aapke share on whatsapp wale pe.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To waise hi aapka matlab wo ho gaya usme usko message dena share on whatsapp pe whatsapp par aur 15 ek minute me to 15 ek minute me bhi mushkil se do se panch minute me to wo apne aap bahar fek diya usko aur kal ke din me kal ke din me to aisa hua jaise hi humne share on whatsapp par click kara hmm hai bhejte usse pehle hi block kar diya.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Okay ek minute rukiye.
Executive: Aur ye seedhe seedhe aapko 24 hours ke liye ye block maar de raha hai utha kar ke fir 24 ghante baad automatically khul jata hai.
Customer: Ha matlab 15 20 minute ke liye block kare to samajh me bhi aata hai ki kar sakte hai pura din hamara waste hota hai hame kitna loss hota hai hame pata hai wo.
Executive: Wo aap normally bhi nahi use kar pa rahe hoge na whatsapp ko kyuki wo integrate.
Customer: Ha hamare liye hamare liye aapka IndiaMART to waise hi waste hai pura sir hamara just dial aur baki sari cheeze jitni inquiry aati hai hamari meta ke ads chalti hai.
Executive: Sara same pe hi chal raha hai.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Wo sara same pe hi matlab ek hi whatsapp hai aapka normal si cheez hai.
Customer: Whatsapp pe na paanch paanch 10-10 de sakte hai sir.
Executive: Ha wo to nahi chala sakte ho wo ek cheez hai to wo uski wajah se usko bhi problem create kar raha hai kyuki wo block ho ja raha hai.
Customer: Ha matlab isliye agar ye cheeze to hum IndiaMART ko hataye fir khatam kare ab bahut loss ho gaya IndiaMART.
Executive: Maine already sir kal dala bhi tha mai ek bari isi wajah se maine abhi aapko call bhi kiya morning me aate hi sabse pehle puchne ke liye ki agar matlab kuch uska video wagera agar available ho jaye to baki koi dikkat nahi hai mai ek baar dobara apni team se na ek bari connect kar le raha hu is cheez ke liye puri team mai samajh gaya to mai ek bari baat kar ke fir mai aapko update kar raha hu ki usme hum kya karna hai theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai sir ho paye na to bataiyega wo usme na daily one minute rakhiye ki haa kar rahe hai ho jayega humko hai na ye problem bar bar nahi.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi mai clear kar ke bata dunga abhi sir mai dal de raha hu testing team pe.
Customer: Ha maine lekin call isliye kara kyuki kal maine IndiaMART help pe mai wo raise kar diya.
Executive: Nahi sir aap waise bhi aap waise bhi sir aapki jab call aayi thi na to aapke direct number pe mere paas call aayi thi.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi.
Executive: Wo to mere paas aapka number tha.
Customer: Ha to aapne mere ko maine us din bhi aap se ek hi cheez boli thi ki sir aapko jab bhi dikkat ho na mere number pe call kar lena.
Customer: Nahi nahi mai kya bol raha hu usse pehle hi maine 96 96 96 wale pe call bhi kara tha.
Executive: Uska call nahi aaya.
Executive: Sir mere paas me uska mere paas call nahi aaya tha uska mere paas baad me mail aaya hai aap se jab meri baat hui na sir.
Customer: Aap isko ek baar please solve kariye bahut problematic ho raha hai.
Executive: Bilkul sir bilkul sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's WhatsApp is getting blocked daily.

- Wants a resolution for the WhatsApp blocking issue.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to connect with team.

- Executive will update the customer on resolution.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- whatsapp, block, lead manager, indiamart
